string.name: Ques1
string.b: 1. What makes this application better from others in the Market?

string.name: Ques2
string.b: 2. How can I Contribute to make this app better ?

string.name: Ques3
string.b: 3. Why do i get weird numbers with \'E\' between them ?

string.name: Ques4
string.b: 4. I Found a Bug, Where to Report?

string.name: Ques5
string.b: 5. I think that "blah..blah" Operation is missing ?

string.name: Ques6
string.b: 6. How can i contact You apart from github and mails ?

string.name: Ques8
string.b: 8. Why Can\'t I save a Matrix Result involving Exponents ?

string.name: Ques9
string.b: 9. Is there any Hope to get Support for Imaginary Numbers ?

string.name: Ques10
string.b: 10. I just Loved your Work, How can i Support You ?

resources.string: This is a Open Source Project, Hence Unique in itself.
This is an Open Source Application and Everyone can contribute to make it better. Here is my Repository https://www.github.com/coder3101 .

The Numbers involving \'E\' are not weird but, another way of representing bigger numbers in Scientific Notation. For Example if Your result is something like \"1.234568245E14\", it means 1.234568245 x 10^14.

If You are an Open Source Project Contributor. You can report problems on github and we will sort it out. Alternatively, You can write to me through Feedback Section of the Application. Or Last but not least you can write issues in Play store Review Page.

I Included most of the Operations (still in Standard 12 did n\'t studied more than this). If You think Some Operations are Missing, Please Let me Know. I will try my best to include them in next versions of the app. (Yeah.. I will also get the opportunity to learn new Operations)
There are many ways to contact me, like you can reach to me on facebook here https://www.facebook.com/coder3101
Hey, its my birthday 31 January. Just a new way to let the World know \"I was born on this date\".

The Matrix Result involving Exponents can\'t be saved as a new Variable because, The Highest number a Cell in the Matrix can hold is 999999. It can hold up to 99999999, if \"Extra Small Font\" is allowed in Settings.

I am currently working on to bring it. But for that it needs a different keyboard etc, so it may take some time but sooner or later it will be added. Also i am Planning to add Support for Trigonometric Ratios.
